casebody.data:
HAN
v.
HALLBERG S256659 Supreme Court of California. AUGUST 21, 2019

Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar, Kruger and Groban, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. The issues to be briefed and argued are limited to the following: Can a trust be a partner in a partnership? Does the death of a partner who has transferred his partnership interest into a trust trigger the buyout-on-death term in the partnership agreement?
